chunks.zh: 记一次结石发作经历
chunks.en: A record of a kidney stone attack experience

chunks.zh:
2 年前体检告知有小结石，很小还不用处理，让平常多喝水。

回顾起来好像没当回事，日常咖啡摄入太多了，主要是拿铁，辅助的有茶、饮用水。
chunks.en:
Two years ago, a physical examination revealed small kidney stones, so small that they didn't need treatment, just drink more water.

Looking back, I didn't seem to take it seriously. I consumed too much coffee daily, mainly lattes, supplemented with tea and drinking water.

chunks.zh: 前天下午刚从洗手间出来，感觉左后腰处有点酸痛感，以为是蹲厕所蹲久了腰疼。
chunks.en: The day before yesterday afternoon, just after coming out of the restroom, I felt a slight ache in my left lower back. I thought it was just a backache from squatting in the toilet for too long.

chunks.zh: 过了一阵感觉疼痛加剧，满头大汗，坐也不是，站也不是，躺着也不行。
chunks.en: After a while, the pain intensified, I was covered in sweat, and I couldn't sit, stand, or lie down.

chunks.zh: 随后打 120 送到附近医院，打了局部麻药（止痛），检查是一颗小结石（ 2.5mm ）掉了，堵住尿道了。
chunks.en: Then I called 120 and was sent to a nearby hospital. I was given a local anesthetic (painkiller), and the examination revealed that a small stone (2.5mm) had fallen and blocked the urethra.

chunks.zh: 输液 1 天，吃药 1 天，依旧时不时发作，发作时用止疼药来缓解。
chunks.en: I had an IV drip for 1 day and took medicine for 1 day, but it still flared up from time to time. I used painkillers to relieve the pain when it flared up.

chunks.zh: 到目前第 3 天感觉好多了，不过不清楚是否有排出来，2.5mm 的结石出来的时候不知道是否感觉明显。
chunks.en: It's much better on the 3rd day so far, but I'm not sure if it's been passed out. I don't know if the passage of a 2.5mm stone would be noticeable.

chunks.zh: 目前听医嘱每天大量饮水，等自然排出，过几天要是还疼痛就得复查。
chunks.en: Currently, I'm following the doctor's advice to drink plenty of water every day and wait for it to pass naturally. If it still hurts in a few days, I'll have to get it checked again.

chunks.zh: 奉劝各位体验有结石的千万别不当回事，多运动，多喝水，疼起来比生孩子都难受.
chunks.en: I advise everyone who has kidney stones to take it seriously, exercise more, drink more water. The pain is worse than giving birth.

chunks.zh: 要是结石比较大，还需要做手术排石，男性就得用管子插入 JJ 进去排石，想想都痛苦。
chunks.en: If the stone is large, surgery is required to remove it. Men have to insert a tube into their d**k to remove the stone, which is painful to even think about.

chunks.zh: 去年，自己：半夜痛到流眼泪，一个人慢慢走出门，打车，到医院，挂号，急诊排队，排到自己了咬牙切齿说先打一针止痛，慢慢走过去缴费，拿药，打针，回到医生那开检查单，等结果，得到结石结论，然后拿止痛药等回家。
chunks.en: Last year, myself: I was in so much pain in the middle of the night that I was in tears. I slowly walked out the door alone, took a taxi to the hospital, registered, waited in the emergency room queue. When it was my turn, I gritted my teeth and said, 'Give me a painkiller shot first.' I slowly walked over to pay, got the medicine, got the shot, went back to the doctor to get a test order, waited for the results, got the kidney stone diagnosis, and then took the painkillers and waited to go home.

chunks.zh: 我就是用管子插入 JJ 进去搞得，插导尿管挺痛苦的，然后身体里还要戴双 J 管三个月，到时间再用钳子从 JJ 里拽出来，拽的时候我倒吸一长口凉气。
chunks.en: I had it done by inserting a tube into my d**k. Inserting the catheter was quite painful, and then I had to wear a double J tube in my body for three months. When the time came, I had to pull it out of my d**k with pliers. I gasped when I pulled it out.

chunks.zh: 我记得输尿管是 4.0mm ，问题不大。
chunks.en: I remember the ureter is 4.0mm, so it's not a big problem.

chunks.zh: 多喝水多跳楼梯（不是跳楼 ），都查出有肾结石了还敢天天喝咖啡……不愧是天生的牛马啊
chunks.en: Drink more water and climb stairs (not jump off a building). You've been diagnosed with kidney stones and you still dare to drink coffee every day... You're worthy of being a born workhorse.

chunks.zh: 还有菠菜现在不敢随便吃了，网上搜到的资料你看看：菠菜中的草酸含量相对较高,长期大量摄入可能增加尿液中草酸的浓度。当草酸与钙结合时,容易形成草酸钙结石,这是肾结石的一种常见类型
chunks.en: Also, I don't dare to eat spinach casually now. Look at the information I found online: Spinach has a relatively high oxalic acid content. Long-term, large intake may increase the concentration of oxalic acid in the urine. When oxalic acid combines with calcium, it easily forms calcium oxalate stones, which is a common type of kidney stone.

chunks.zh: 为省 12000 元手术费男子每天喝 5 升水终排出结石来自山东 26 岁的小孙在上海做程序员，需要长时间坐在电脑前。业余时间他喜欢钓鱼 2024 年 10 月 20 日，他睡觉时突然腰部剧痛，去医院被诊断出双肾有结石，其中左肾结石卡在了输尿管入口。小孙表示，得知激光碎石需要 12000 元，且自己对于手术治疗十分恐惧，他最终决定靠喝水运动自行排出结石。他坚持每天喝超 5 升水，慢跑 5 公里，经过一两个月的努力，今年 2 月 2 日(年初五)，终于将这块 9 毫米左右的结石排出。他准备把结石裱起来，提醒自己平时多喝水。
chunks.en: To save 12,000 yuan in surgery costs, a man from Shandong who works as a 26-year-old programmer in Shanghai drinks 5 liters of water every day to finally pass the kidney stone. He needs to sit in front of the computer for a long time. In his spare time, he likes to go fishing. On October 20, 2024, he suddenly suffered severe lower back pain while sleeping and went to the hospital, where he was diagnosed with kidney stones in both kidneys. The kidney stone in the left kidney was stuck at the entrance of the ureter. Xiao Sun said that after learning that laser lithotripsy would cost 12,000 yuan and that he was very afraid of surgery, he finally decided to rely on drinking water and exercising to pass the kidney stone on his own. He insisted on drinking more than 5 liters of water every day and jogging 5 kilometers. After a month or two of efforts, on February 2 this year (the fifth day of the Lunar New Year), he finally passed the stone of about 9 mm. He plans to frame the stone to remind himself to drink more water at ordinary times.

chunks.zh: @touchwithe https://www.healthline.com/health/coffee-and-kidney-stones#current-research 似乎不会
chunks.en: @touchwithe https://www.healthline.com/health/coffee-and-kidney-stones#current-research It seems it doesn't

chunks.zh: 疼痛指数仅次于分娩各位勇士可以体验下
chunks.en: The pain index is second only to childbirth. Warriors, you can experience it.

chunks.zh: 谁说要 插 JJ ？ 超声波碎石，放在你小肚子 震震震 就行了
chunks.en: Who said you have to insert it into your d**k? Ultrasonic lithotripsy, just put it on your lower belly and vibrate!

chunks.zh: 小的会刺痛，大的反而是隐痛。多喝水跳一跳就好了，2.5mm 放心肯定能排掉，太小了做不了手术😅
chunks.en: Small ones will sting, while large ones will cause dull pain. Drink more water and jump around, and it will be fine. Don't worry, the 2.5mm one will definitely pass. It's too small to have surgery 😅

chunks.zh: 大学的时候发作过一次，疼了 3 天，在床上一直吐，疼得蜷起来撞墙。当时是 6mm ，后面开了点药，过年回家在复查，居然消失了。后面每年体检，基本上都是有结晶，但是喝水比较多，再也没疼过。非常理解 LZ ，没疼过确实不当回事，经历过了，就懂了。
chunks.en: I had an attack once in college. It hurt for 3 days. I kept throwing up in bed. I was in so much pain that I curled up and hit the wall. It was 6mm at the time. Later, I prescribed some medicine, and when I went home for the New Year, the re-examination showed that it had disappeared. After that, basically every annual physical examination shows crystals, but I drink more water, so I haven't had any pain since then. I really understand LZ. If you haven't experienced the pain, you really don't take it seriously. Once you've experienced it, you'll understand.

chunks.zh: 记得疼的时候跪着
chunks.en: Remember to kneel when it hurts

chunks.zh: 减肥，坚持 跑步，戒糖
chunks.en: Lose weight, keep running, quit sugar

chunks.zh: 看完你这个帖子我喝了半瓶水。
chunks.en: I drank half a bottle of water after reading your post.

chunks.zh: 多喝茶,多喝可乐,利尿
chunks.en: Drink more tea, drink more cola, diuretic

chunks.zh: 咖啡也利尿
chunks.en: Coffee is also a diuretic

chunks.zh: @Vneix 一模一样，半夜三点痛到打滚，然后一个人叫出租去急诊，检查，抗到天亮做碎石手术。真得多喝水 v 友们
chunks.en: @Vneix Exactly the same, I was in so much pain that I was rolling around at three in the morning, then I called a taxi to the emergency room alone, got checked, and endured until dawn for lithotripsy surgery. V friends, you really have to drink more water

chunks.zh: 去年也是结石。打车去的医院，挂了个门诊在外面等，痛得我想在医院地上打滚，然后外面坐了一会突然不痛了。最后流程走下来医生说是结石已经掉到尿道了，开了点要就回家了。
chunks.en: I also had kidney stones last year. I took a taxi to the hospital, registered at the outpatient clinic and waited outside. The pain was so bad that I wanted to roll around on the floor of the hospital, and then after sitting outside for a while, the pain suddenly stopped. At the end of the process, the doctor said that the stone had already fallen into the urethra, and prescribed some medicine and went home.

chunks.zh: 三天前，开工头一天凌晨结石痛，痛的满头大汗，连夜去挂急诊。检查后发现右肾有 9mm 的结石，医生建议手术，但是听到是从鸡鸡里插管，果断选择碎石。第三天炎症消了后，做了体外碎石。医生嘱咐每天要喝 3L 水，第一次喝水喝到想吐🤮。
chunks.en: Three days ago, on the first day back to work, I had kidney stone pain in the early morning. I was covered in sweat and went to the emergency room overnight. After the examination, it was found that there was a 9mm stone in the right kidney. The doctor suggested surgery, but when I heard that the tube would be inserted from the d**k, I decisively chose lithotripsy. After the inflammation subsided on the third day, I had extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy. The doctor told me to drink 3L of water every day. It was the first time I drank water until I wanted to vomit🤮.

chunks.zh: 2023 有一次，感觉像是生孩子的疼，是在肾到输尿管接口位置刚好堵住，好在不大输液，以及甚至打了杜冷丁，从早上到晚上，好了，可能是排出去了好像
chunks.en: Once in 2023, it felt like the pain of childbirth. It was blocked right at the junction of the kidney and the ureter. Fortunately, it wasn't big, so I had an IV drip and even an injection of Demerol. It was fine from morning to night. It seems that it might have been excreted.
